dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3821 EH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 430 Main Street in Clermont, Georgia, as the “Zack T. Addington Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 430 Main Street in Clermont, Georgia, as the Zack T. Addington Post Office.

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 430 Main Street in Clermont, Georgia, shall be known and designated as the Zack T. Addington Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Zack T. Addington Post Office.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives November 15, 2017.
